about_the_game:
This DLC contains bonus game "Find Exit".

"Find Exit" - it is my first project. This game served as inspiration and prototype for my future work. In this game you will find not a single word, but instead it have 3 huge labyrinths in which you need to find the teleport. Your task is to help the Demon find a way out and return home to his astral world.
(DLC can be found in main game folder, and it needs to start manually).
detailed_description:
This DLC contains bonus game "Find Exit".

"Find Exit" - it is my first project. This game served as inspiration and prototype for my future work. In this game you will find not a single word, but instead it have 3 huge labyrinths in which you need to find the teleport. Your task is to help the Demon find a way out and return home to his astral world.
(DLC can be found in main game folder, and it needs to start manually).
name: Find Exit (Simple Story - Alex DLC)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible

short_description: This DLC contains the bonus game "Find Exit".
